abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32542838, pmid32538518, pmid32539153, pmid32530458, pmid32543753, pmid32543722, pmid32544288, pmid32538661, pmid32544281, pmid32538780, pmid32543260, pmid32543713, pmid32542753, pmid32542396, pmid32542444, pmid32543906, pmid32537704, pmid32539093, pmid32543971, pmid32543298, pmid32542177, pmid32544146, pmid32543923, pmid32536989, pmid32544053, pmid32538647, pmid32543294, pmid32538597, pmid32530454, pmid32527733, pmid32538664, pmid32543675
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.06.18
